challenge.title: Challenge 25
challenge.author: Bhanudev Chaluvadi Spyros Gasteratos
challenge.description: Time to hurry! You have mistakenly sent an important mail to the wrong person. The details of the mail are too valuable and you can't risk them being read by a wrong person.So, hurry up and stop the person from reading the mail. Your Email: user234@email.com Password: Usr@#$lc
